title: IBM security advisory (AV25-293)
description: Between May 19 and 25, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: IBM Integrated Analytics System  versions 1.0.0.0 to 1.0.30.0
IBM MANTA Automated Data Lineage for IBM Cloud Pak for Data  versions 5.0 to 5.1.2
IBM watsonx Assistant Cartridge  versions 4.0 to 5.1.2
IBM watsonx Orchestrate with watsonx Assistant Cartridge - Assistant Builder Component  versions 5.0 to 5.1.2
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
